#summary Humo syntaxis

= Language operations =

===Defining a production===
<code language="js">
p1{v1}
</code>
Defines a production p1 with value v1

===Using a production===
<code language="js">
   result{p1}
</code>

When producton p1 is found it's replaced by its value v1.
<code language="js">
   result{v1}
</code>
